languages.text: "Хотя бы перед смертью этот скучный мон-кай выкинул что-то забавное. Попытался укусить сво{mf|его|ю} хозя{mf|ина|йку} — неуклюже и безыскусно, конечно, но хотя бы так".
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne stood against the RT at the final showdown and was executed.

traits.locale_text: "Хотя бы перед смертью этот скучный мон-кай выкинул что-то забавное. Попытался укусить своего/ю хозяйку — неуклюже и безыскусно, конечно, но хотя бы так".

languages.text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne stood against the RT at the final showdown and was executed.
languages.original_text: "Хотя бы перед смертью этот скучный мон-кай выкинул что-то забавное. Попытался укусить сво{mf|его|ю} хозя{mf|ина|йку} — неуклюже и безыскусно, конечно, но хотя бы так".

traits.locale_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."
"At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."
"At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

"At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."
"At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

languages.text: 「少なくとも、あの退屈なモン＝ケイは死ぬ前にひとつくらいは面白いことをしたな。ご主人様の手に噛みついたやり方は味気なくて、洗練さを欠いていたが…まあ、何もしないよりはマシか」
languages.original_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

traits.locale_text: 「少なくとも、あの退屈なモン＝ケイは死ぬ前にひとつくらいは面白いことをしたな。ご主人様の手に噛みついたやり方は味気なくて、洗練さを欠いていたが…まあ、何もしないよりはマシか」

languages.text: "Immerhin hat dieser öde Chem-Pan-Sey noch etwas Interessantes getan, bevor er gestorben ist. Wie er in die Hand seines Herren gebissen hat, das war fade und unelegant, aber doch immer noch besser als nichts."
languages.original_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Immerhin hat dieser öde Chem-Pan-Sey noch etwas Interessantes getan, bevor er gestorben ist. Wie er in die Hand seines Herren gebissen hat, das war fade und unelegant, aber doch immer noch besser als nichts."

languages.text: « Au moins, ce mon-keigh ennuyeux a su se rendre intéressant avant de mourir. La façon dont il a mordu la main de {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse} était banale et inélégante, mais c'est toujours mieux que rien. »
languages.original_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, ce mon-keigh ennuyeux a su se rendre intéressant avant de mourir. La façon dont il a mordu la main de {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse} était banale et inélégante, mais c'est toujours mieux que rien. »

languages.text: «Por lo menos ese patético mon-keigh hizo algo interesante antes de morir. Mordió la mano de su {mf|amo|ama} de una manera insulsa y poco elegante, pero supongo que menos da una piedra».
languages.original_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo menos ese patético mon-keigh hizo algo interesante antes de morir. Mordió la mano de su {mf|amo|ama} de una manera insulsa y poco elegante, pero supongo que menos da una piedra».

languages.text: “至少那只愚蠢的猴子临死前做了件有趣的事情。他转头咬了主人一口，他的做法既无趣、又粗糙，但我猜，这总比什么都不做要好。”
languages.original_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

traits.locale_text: “至少那只愚蠢的猴子临死前做了件有趣的事情。他转头咬了主人一口，他的做法既无趣、又粗糙，但我猜，这总比什么都不做要好。”

languages.text: "O mon-keigh süprüntüsü, en azından ölmeden bizi şaşırtmayı başardı. Efendisinin elini ısırması her ne kadar bayağı ve adice olsa da hiç yoktan iyidir."
languages.original_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."

traits.locale_text: "O mon-keigh süprüntüsü, en azından ölmeden bizi şaşırtmayı başardı. Efendisinin elini ısırması her ne kadar bayağı ve adice olsa da hiç yoktan iyidir."

languages.original_text: "At least that dull mon-keigh did something interesting before he died. The way he bit his master's hand was bland and inelegant, but I suppose that is better than nothing."
